thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 44 of 3060
thread.title: Linda

author: Linda
title: Linda
text:
I have used Rentalcars.com around the world for years now, as the rental rates are simply superior, and I like the option to include full protection particularly.
I have had two bad experiences with local rental companies and have realized that the local Car Rental companies are very quick to attach your excess if they perceive damage, and the full excess even when the damage isn't that much. The ONLY option is taking out full protection. Peace of mind when renting.
I have had to lay a claim to have my excess refunded recently and I was astounded at the efficient and totally professional manner in which the claim was assessed and concluded. Exceptional communication from the agent involved.
As long as you have all the documents requested, there was literally only a day or so that the claim took to be concluded.
Customer for life, and I will make sure everyone I know rents a car the same way I do!
